title: Only League Crashes My Computer
body:
I have a powerful rig, and I play Dragon Age Inquisition, Heroes of the Storm, Dota 2, Starcraft, etc. all on maximum settings with no problems, but League of Legends crashes mid way through game every few games. I've run performance monitors. My cpu and gpu never exceed %60of their resources for league of legends. I've been trying to eliminate the problem. I updated my AMD drivers, I tried the Beta drivers. My components stay cool. Anyone else having this problem? Pasting my DxDiag.

It's good to know I'm not the only one... I made a new PC during Black Friday and it was an AMD build with brand new parts. When I played league, my PC would stay running smoothly, but the monitor shuts off and says there is no input. No wifi comes into the computer, and my mouse and keyboard stop working. Originally I thought it might be an issue with the motherboard or power supply, but I'm happy I saw this thread before buying new parts. Assassins Creed Origins and other games run smooth AF on my PC and it was so strange to see League crash almost every game...

I really hope they figure out a fix for this, it worries me that some of the comments in this thread are nearly 3 years old...
